Title: MediaAutomator
Description: This project was created in order to provide an automation for media files (videos, music, etc)
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project was created in order to provide an automation for media files (videos, music, etc)

This program was started with the ideia to organize downloads and move recognized files to XBMC libraries.

By running this program, it will analyse files contained in the "directory to scan" and will move the known files to their corresponing directories (movies, tv shows, etc).

At the moment the first goal is to support organizing movies and tv shows.
